name: Clean Knight
description:
Summary:

This game teaches children how to properly wash their hands and have some fun with it too!

Covid-19 is attempting to infect your town. Play as Clean Knight and work with TP Wizard to purify the town's water supply and prevent the virus from spreading.

Collaboration By:

Andrew Van Winkle - Character Entrepreneur/ Animator/ UI Artist 

Jonathan Campbell - TP Master/ Programmer/ Level Designer 

Harley Koontz - Particle Pal/ Environment Artist/UI Artist

Music Credit:
